Text: Nice find my friend. Yes, crack and the such included. Keep up the good work.

It seems I spoke too soon. I dont know if its the crack or the patch but it makes it so on the after battle screen you cant see the names of what units were killed or wounded, it just says killed(#) etc.

Also, you cant patch back after words because your save will be incompatible.

Use at own risk...
